title: Fraktur 1939ca Poster KDF-Wagen (Volkswagon)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KDF-WagenVolkswagon1939ca_4240.jpg)
  
Close to Element, National-Werkschrift, Tannenburg, Potsdam, but none are an exact fit. Has me stumped.  
Any ideas and/or additional letters that match.  
I can't decide if this is a font or precise lettering.  
Thanks
author: donshottype

comments.content:
So here is all I have on National light weight, a very small image of the character set.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1934-National-Werkschrift_3467.jpg)
  
Can't decide if Kdf-Wagen is essentially the same or definitely something else.  
Would love to see a higher definition character set, or even a range of letters.  
Don
